caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. ROBERT HILLARD

opinion.posture: IN RE: Robert Hillard applying for Rehearing of this Court's Order dated February 7, 1997; Parish of Orleans Criminal District Court, Div. "C" No. 272-836.
opinion.opinion_text:
Rehearing denied.
